messages.title: A message from David
messages.content: I've been working with residents on local issues to improve St. Michael's. I want to continue this as your councillor and ask for your support on Thursday 6th May.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will oppose any attempts to build on Greenbelt land
Labour will start a programme of repairs to residential roads on a worst first basis
Labour will improve the Out-Of-Hours service in Coventry and urge Police and Council to use the new powers they have been given

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: The Conservative Council is committed to build on the Greenbelt

issues.economy: Labour will reduce the deficit and protect front line services
issues.environment: Labour will oppose any attempts to build on Greenbelt land
issues.governance: Despite the recession crime is falling and where problems remain tough new powers are being put in place to support the community

housing.content: Labour will oppose any attempts to build on Greenbelt land

contactInformation.address: Coventry South Labour Party, FREEPOST NAT 23005, Coventry, CV5 6BR

images.caption: Jim Cunningham at Canley Children's Centre
